text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/cited-medium defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
internet InternetOnline publication in a periodic release. Used to match NLM JournalIssue CitedMedium code for online version.
print PrintPrint publication in a periodic release. Used to match NLM JournalIssue CitedMedium code for print version.
offline-digital-storage Offline Digital StoragePublication in a physical device for electronic data storage, organized in issues for periodic release.
internet-without-issue Internet without issueOnline publication without any periodic release. Used for article specific publication date which could be the same as or different from journal issue publication date.
print-without-issue Print without issuePrint publication without any periodic release.
offline-digital-storage-without-issue Offline Digital Storage without issuePublication in a physical device for electronic data storage, without any periodic release.

concept.definition: Online publication in a periodic release. Used to match NLM JournalIssue CitedMedium code for online version.
Print publication in a periodic release. Used to match NLM JournalIssue CitedMedium code for print version.
Publication in a physical device for electronic data storage, organized in issues for periodic release.
Online publication without any periodic release. Used for article specific publication date which could be the same as or different from journal issue publication date.
Print publication without any periodic release.
Publication in a physical device for electronic data storage, without any periodic release.
